document_data.mainbody:
Chremy was a pirate lieutenant, who worked for the pirate king, Desharik, in Brynnlaw.
Chremy was a rude and hardy man. He considered others his property, and did not care for them in the slightest.
Chremy worked for Brynnlaws pirate king, Desharik. For his good service, he was given Ginia as a courtesan, for himself and his fellow pirates. He was a particularly cruel master of Lady Galvenas Festhall, and wore the festhalls medallion for identification.
